channel.title: Steam problem ...
channel.description: I downloaded Half-Life Black Mesa yesterday. I was playing the whole night. Today I can not find a half-life black mesa in my games section (Steam). It is as if the game was not installed on my computer! Hmm I read on the internet that some people had this problem. Anyone have a clue about this:'(? The only way i can play the game is : i reinstall it then at the end and i click yes i wanna play now!! Lol seem's wrong man... Heelppp !!!

item.title: Steam problem ...
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Did you restart Steam after installing Black Mesa?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam problem ...
item.dc:creator: Darkblot
item.description:
Did you have a system crash? It may take over 20 minutes to get back your files.

Did you sync the game to Steam, so that it showed in your library?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam problem ...
item.dc:creator: Forcada
item.description:
Its all good, by the way, great come back man!!! I was 13 years old at the time… Now im 25 and i get the same feeling!! Lol very cool man Half-Life is the number 1 !!!:bms:

I downloaded Half-Life Black Mesa yesterday. I was playing the whole night. Today I can not find a half-life black mesa in my games section (Steam). It is as if the game was not installed on my computer! Hmm I read on the internet that some people had this problem. Anyone have a clue about this:’(? The only way i can play the game is : i reinstall it then at the end and i click yes i wanna play now!! Lol seem’s wrong man… Heelppp !!!
